typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		originatingleadid as string,
		revenue as decimal(38,18),
		industrycode as integer,
		numberofemployees as integer,
		accountid as string,
		transactioncurrencyid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		territoryid as string,
		createdon as timestamp,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> DataverseParquet
source(output(
		SK_accountid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_accountid as string,
		name as string,
		ownerid as string,
		orignatingleadid as string,
		renevue as decimal(19,4),
		numberofemployees as integer,
		territoryid as string,
		industrycode as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		createdon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG
DataverseParquet derive(RAWHASH = crc32(512,upper(toString(ownerid)),toString(name),toString(revenue),toString(numberofemployees),toString(industrycode),upper(toString(originatingleadid)),upper(toString(territoryid)))) ~> CrearHASH
CrearHASH, STG lookup(upper(accountid) == BK_accountid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(HASHKEY),
	HASHKEY != RAWHASH,
	disjoint: false) ~> Split@(Nuevos, Actualizaciones, Nada)
Split@Nuevos alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Insertar
Split@Actualizaciones alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> Actualizar
Insertar sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_accountid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_accountid as string,
		name as string,
		ownerid as string,
		orignatingleadid as string,
		renevue as decimal(19,4),
		numberofemployees as integer,
		territoryid as string,
		industrycode as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		createdon as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HASHKEY = RAWHASH,
		BK_accountid = accountid,
		name = Split@Nuevos@name,
		ownerid = Split@Nuevos@ownerid,
		orignatingleadid = originatingleadid,
		renevue = revenue,
		numberofemployees = Split@Nuevos@numberofemployees,
		territoryid = Split@Nuevos@territoryid,
		industrycode = Split@Nuevos@industrycode,
		modifiedon = Split@Nuevos@modifiedon,
		createdon = Split@Nuevos@createdon
	)) ~> Nuevos
Actualizar sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_accountid as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_accountid as string,
		name as string,
		ownerid as string,
		orignatingleadid as string,
		renevue as decimal(19,4),
		numberofemployees as integer,
		territoryid as string,
		industrycode as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		createdon as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HASHKEY = RAWHASH,
		BK_accountid = accountid,
		name = Split@Actualizaciones@name,
		ownerid = Split@Actualizaciones@ownerid,
		orignatingleadid,
		renevue = revenue,
		numberofemployees = Split@Actualizaciones@numberofemployees,
		territoryid = Split@Actualizaciones@territoryid,
		industrycode = Split@Actualizaciones@industrycode,
		modifiedon = Split@Actualizaciones@modifiedon,
		createdon = Split@Actualizaciones@createdon
	)) ~> Actualizaciones
